author: Esther Fung
title: Are You Into Needlepoint or Vintage Clothing? There’s a Crawl for That
text:
America is crawling with crawls.
Store owners and downtown planning committees in cities around the U.S. are organizing shop crawls—often with alcohol flowing—to spark consumer interest in an era of online shopping.
In recent months shoppers were treated to a three-hour vintage and salvage-shop crawl in Kenosha, Wis., a summer-shop crawl in...
